name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.build: rollup --config rollup.config.js --environment BUILD:production && mkdir -p ./demo-vault/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-macros && cp build/main.js ./demo-vault/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-macros/main.js && cp manifest.json ./demo-vault/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-macros/manifest.json
